content.text:
# The Weblog Awards

The Weblog Awards may refer to:
* The Weblog Awards (Bloggies), presented since 2001
* The Weblog Awards (Wizbang), presented from 2003 through 2008
See also
* Blog award, an award for the best blog in a given category
